sentences.english: The Kowloon hills had disappeared completely.
sentences.chinese: 九龍山已經徹底消失了。

sentences.english: He immediately sent to the black dragon mountain had two dogs find our land.
sentences.chinese: 他立即派謝二狗去黑龍山上一探虛實。

sentences.english: After that, the spring on Nine Dragon Hill became officially the Second Spring Under Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 從此，九龍山泉水，便定爲“天下第二泉”。

sentences.english: The chinese city wall originated in the period of LongShan Culture of the late primitive society.
sentences.chinese: 中國的城牆起源於原始社會後期，即龍山文化時代。

sentences.english: The ritual vessels are one of important factors in the process of social civilization of Shandong Longshan Cuture.
sentences.chinese: 禮器是山東龍山文化文明化進程中的重要因素之一。

sentences.english: Huanglong Mountain Reclamation was given during the war established under the social background.
sentences.chinese: 陝西黃龍山墾區是在戰時特定的社會背景下形成的。

sentences.english: The rice terraces of Longshan are an agricultural wonder.
sentences.chinese: 龍山的稻田是一個農業奇蹟。

sentences.english: The nine day Longshan drink, Huanghua officials laugh.
sentences.chinese: 九日龍山飲，黃花笑逐臣。

sentences.english: New ferns from Jiulung Shan, S. W. Zhejiang Province.

sentences.english: But why did he die on Longshan Island and why was this temple built?
sentences.chinese: 可是爲什麼要在龍山島上建海瑞祠呢？

sentences.english: WangXiaoGong on the black dragon mountain, will decorate the room with new residence.
sentences.chinese: 王小紅上了黑龍山，將房間佈置得跟新房一樣。

sentences.english: There are many scholars worshiped here on Longshan Island.
sentences.chinese: 這龍山島上供奉的都是有學問的人。

sentences.english: Wenfengta leaps Mt. Longshan located at Ninghai County, was constructs at the end of the Ming dynasty brick tower.
sentences.chinese: 文峯塔位於寧海縣躍龍山，是建於明末的磚塔。

sentences.english: You can visit the site of dinosaur eggs fossils at Mt. Qinglong in Yunxian County.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去參觀鄖縣青龍山恐龍蛋化石。

sentences.english: Beautiful campus , the bassinet of the knowledge . It feed the child under the Wulong mountain.
sentences.chinese: 美麗的校園，知識的搖籃，哺育着五龍山下子孫。

sentences.english: Longshan because of its unique natural form named.
sentences.chinese: 龍山因其獨特的自然形態而得名。
